# Portfolio Summary
Personal cybersecurity portfolio showcasing pentesting, network configs, and Laravel APIs.

# Key Pages
- About: /about - Bio and expertise in Docker, OAuth, and forensic analysis.
- Projects: /projects - VLAN setups, honeypots, and React/Vite apps.
- Blog: /blog - Cybersecurity workshops and incident response guides.
- Shawarma: - Section dedicated to the worship of divine kebab
